item.title: Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Hey Guys I am looking for a video editor to edit my YouTube videos.

It's a pretty straightforward task, all you have to do is add music to the photo, and both will provided by me, after doing all that you just have to add a filter/effect to the whole video.

It will take about hardly 5 - 10 minutes to edit the full video.

I will pay 6$ to edit 2 videos.

It's pretty easy and anyone who knows little about editing can do it. Hoping to hear from you guys.

Budget: $6
Posted On: June 30, 2024 10:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: India

item.title: Video motion design for explain rule of the game - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Motion Designer for an exciting project. We are developing an application on Telegram and need a motion design video to explain the rules of our game to users. Duration of the video : 1min maximum.

Required Skills:

Expertise in motion design and video animation
Proficiency in creation and animation software (After Effects, Premiere Pro, etc.)
Ability to explain concepts clearly and visually
Creativity and attention to detail

Project Details:

Creation of an explanatory motion design video
Collaboration with our team to understand the game rules and translate them into an engaging and informative video
If you are passionate about motion design and want to be part of an innovative project, please send us your portfolio and references.


Posted On: June 30, 2024 10:35 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Production, 2D Animation, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Voice Acting
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Production, 2D Animation, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Voice Acting
Country: France

item.title: TikTok Shop - Creator Affiliate Program Manager - Upwork
item.description:
PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB POST BEFORE APPLYING.
Compensation is a base plus commision with a potential for substantial monthly income.

Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced and enthusiastic TikTok Shop - Creator Affiliate Program Manager to join our team. In this role, you will manage all aspects of our TikTok Shop channels, working closely with creators to produce high-quality videos and live sessions. Your primary responsibilities will include coordinating products, researching trends, sending products to creators, scripting videos, and analyzing performance.

Responsibilities:

- Manage and oversee TikTok Shop channels and creator affiliate programs.
- Research and identify trending and viral products.
- Analyze competitors to understand what works and how it can increase product sales.
- Coordinate product selection and recommend products based on virality and commission structure with our Brand Division.
- Once a product is approved and the Brand Division confirms the terms (commission, boosting budget, upfront payment - if any), - order the product and ensure the creator receives it.
- Develop and provide detailed scripts for creators to enhance sales and use best practices for viral videos.
- Ensure creators are making the necessary videos based on the scripts you provide.
- Communicate with creators to ensure timely delivery of videos.
- Post videos on the account with proper hashtags and titles. Use popular trends and hashtags to increase visibility.
- Ensure the brand is boosting the video, based on the agreed-upon terms.
- Engage with all followers, comments, and other content.
- Ensure creators receive products on time and provide raw videos to you.
- Coordinate with video editors to create viral videos (you will receive raw videos from the creator, send them to the editor, and then post).
- Analyze performance metrics and continuously optimize content strategies.
- Stay updated with TikTok Shop policies and best practices.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience with TikTok Shop and creator affiliate programs.
- In-depth knowledge of the TikTok Shop Creator Affiliate Program and the strategies outlined in the provided manual.
- Strong organizational and communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks effectively.
- Experience in creating and analyzing TikTok media content.
- Familiarity with analytics tools to track and optimize performance.
- Strong and fluent English Language.

Benefits:

Flexible working hours.
Opportunity to add more clients to your portfolio, increasing commission potential.
Work remotely with a dynamic and supportive team.
Gain valuable experience in a fast-growing media company.

Position: TikTok Shop - Creator Affiliate Program Manager
Location: Remote
Type: Part-Time (Minimum 30 hours per week)
Compensation: Base rate of $200 per month plus 5% commission on sales (commission paid after the $200 is accounted for the 5% commission)

About Us:
Sun and Sky Entertainment is a dynamic media company that owns and manages multiple YouTube and TikTok channels. We specialize in creating engaging content and monetizing social media platforms. Our mission is to empower creators and deliver exceptional content to our audiences.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 30, 2024 10:28 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, Influencer Marketing, TikTok Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Affiliate Marketing
Skills: TikTok, Influencer Marketing, TikTok Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Affiliate Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editors YouTube IN-HOUSE Team | LONG TERM POSSITION | NEWS Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an in-house team of editors Do you have experience editing videos like these ones?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BNQ9Z1Bjwes
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=unhgYCHiqc8

If you can handle at least 5 videos per day OR you have a team that can, please send me a message to start today.

Video lenght: around 20min (including interview/reaction clips). Price 1$ per min, 20$ per video. Price per day 100$ per 5 scripts. 700$ per week. 2800$ per month.

***[IMPORTANT] Please attach previous videos edited by you or your team. If not, your offer WON'T be read.

Budget: $2,800

item.title: Espanol Video Creator for How To Tutorial Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for video creators to produce step-by-step tutorials for software, apps, email marketing tools, and product breakdowns in engaging Spanish voice-over recordings of their computer or phone screens.

Examples of videos we're looking for:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nR4NKpFljeo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E3dajk5WjiM

**Requirements:**

- Native or fluent Spanish speakers preferred
- Access to a good-quality microphone
- Each video should be 8+ minutes
- Ability to explain concepts clearly and concisely
- We provide video topics, relevant information, examples, and similar videos
- Occasional research may be required
- 1-3 videos per day
- Experience creating similar videos is preferred (please send samples)

**Benefits:**

- $6 per video
- Payment per video—earn more by creating more videos
- Flexible work hours—record at your convenience
- Long-term position offering stability and flexibility

If this sounds like a fit for you, submit your proposal with "INTRUSTED" as the first word to show you've read the whole job post.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 30, 2024 10:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Editing, Screencasting Video, Education, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Videography
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Editing, Screencasting Video, Education, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Videography
Country: India
click to apply
